div.head: Handuraw - Capiz State University (CAPSU) Institutional Repository
div.p: Handuraw is the digital archive of Capiz State University (CAPSU) that aims to empower CAPSUnians to ideate, contribute, share, collaborate, and disseminate their knowledge and innovations.

Objectives:
Facilitate long-term and sustainable preservation of CAPSUâ€™s digital assets for easy access and retrieval.
Provide efficient and user-friendly access to CAPSU digital contents such as CAPSU journals, books, manuals, theses, dissertations, and other publications.
Support scholarly initiatives aligned with instruction, research, extension, and production by making these publications accessible and visible to users and researchers.
